description:
Founder Jonathan D'Agostino opened the Manhattan law office of D'Agostino & Associates, P.C., to allow our legal team's services to be more accessible to all of the residents of the New York City area. From our Madison Avenue law office, we serve clients from both New York and New Jersey who have a need in any of our firm's practice areas, including:

•         Personal injury

•         Wrongful death

•         Social Security Disability

•         Criminal defense

While our firm focuses primarily on personal injury law, our attorneys also have years of experience in our other practice areas. So, if you were in an accident, if your Social Security Disability claim was denied, if you lost a loved one or if you face criminal charges, you can count on receiving quality representation from the legal team at our law firm.

If you are looking for a dependable, compassionate attorney who will treat you with dignity and respect, you will find not only one, but eight, at the law firm of D'Agostino & Associates, P.C. Our attorneys work together on every case, and your case will be no different. You can learn more about the benefits of choosing our law firm by scheduling a free initial consultation to discuss the details of your case.
